item.title: Diffusion for World Modeling: Visual Details Matter in Atari
item.description: DIAMOND, a novel reinforcement learning agent using a diffusion world model, achieves state-of-the-art performance on the Atari 100k benchmark by leveraging visual details often ignored by discrete la…
